Spaceships

The object of this game is to defeat all of the enemy spaceships by using lasers.

How to play:

Use the left and right arrow keys to move left and right on the screen.
Use the up arrow key to shoot lasers at enemy ship.
To destroy enemy ships you must hit them with your lasers, so make sure you aim properly

About what I learned

This unit I learned a lot about java script in both creating a website and a game. In this game I used different information from different chapters with Mirmir, the types of code that I used were the following:
- If and else statements
- Sprites
- Variables
- Functions
- Positions
- Velocity
- Colliding
- Width and Height
But in this unit I have learned a lot more than just that, I have learned how to create circles, how to add images and sounds, and if and else statements, I also learned how to add and change colors using rgb and create colors, and how to use positions to move things around, along with mouseX and mouseY. I also learned how to change the color and size of the text in a website and how to add a header, a break, and a paragraph. I learned how to add images, and how to load sounds and images. I learned how to change the font of the text. I learned how to make variables. But not only that but how to create sprites and add them to groups and create animations, I learned how to use functions. How to create websites and how to do padding and margin, How to use classes and how to change the size and shape of paragraphs. I learned how to create for loops. I learned how to use keys pressed to see if you're pressing a key or not. I learned how to use collision detection. I also learned how to use movement magic, and how to use random, and repetition which is how to use loops to repeat stuff. And how to use arrays. I learned how to make the layout of a website and how to style a website to make it look better. I learned how to use gravity and velocity and animation, along with how to create a labyrinth using blocks. I also learned how to create a stage and what everything in a stage means, and how to change blocks and animations. I learned about pixels and how to change the color and where each pixel is and how to show a pixel at a specific point, also how to create a mosaic and how to see the specific color of a pixel. I learned how to create a filter and how to change only half of the colors into the opposite of the other half. And finally I have learned how to create classes in a game, and how to write code in those classes, how to make buttons and connect it to a website, and how to use onclick in websites, and hover.
